headline: Schlumberger Limited (SLB): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Schlumberger Limited (SLB) on Business Model Mastery’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on SLB. Schlumberger Limited (SLB)’s share was trading at $33.34 as of 2nd June. SLB’s trailing and forward P/E were 11.30 and 10.29 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. This company stands out as […]

headline: Is It Worth Investing in Schlumberger (SLB) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Schlumberger (SLB) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
